√srīv 'fail'

present: [4.] arīvyanti  

[perfect: sisreva  asrevīt  sreviṣyati  srevitā  srūta  srevitvā  srūtvā  ]

secondary: intensive: sesrīv-   -- desiderative: sisreviṣa-  susrūṣa-   -- causative: sreváyant  śrīvayati  

derivatives: -srīví?  -sreman? RV.  

Sometimes found written with ś for s.
